rooms.description: Welcoming area with foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning entrance direction and natural light. Decorated with Mediterranean style arches.
Spacious living area featuring comfortable seating, ambient lighting, and decorative Mediterranean accents. Vastu: positioned to allow positive energy flow from the entrance.
Functional dining space with a modern Mediterranean table setting; includes provisions for family meals in joint family setup.
Fully equipped kitchen designed with ample storage and ventilation. Vastu: oriented to ensure proper air circulation and natural light.
Primary bedroom featuring a private balcony overlooking the garden. Adheres to Mediterranean design elements with wooden finishes and decorative moldings.
Modern bathroom designed for privacy and comfort. Vastu guidelines ensure proper placement relative to the bedroom entrance.

openings.description: Main entry door aligned with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
